verses.roman:
aṅga ughāḍiyā dekhāi vasilā duyāre
kahite lāgilā kichu sumadhura svare

synonyms: aṅga ughāḍiyā—exposing part of her body; dekhāi—visible; vasilā—sat down; duyāre—on the threshold of the door; kahite lāgilā—began to speak; kichu—something; su-madhura svare—in very sweet language.
translation: Exposing part of her body to his view, she sat down on the threshold of the door and spoke to him in very sweet words.
